org.apache.flink.client.deployment

接口 ClusterDescriptor<ClientType extends ClusterClient>

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractYarnClusterDescriptor, Flip6StandaloneClusterDescriptor, StandaloneClusterDescriptor, YarnClusterDescriptor, YarnClusterDescriptorV2

    public interface ClusterDescriptor<ClientType extends ClusterClient>
    A descriptor to deploy a cluster (e.g. Yarn or Mesos) and return a Client for Cluster communication.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ClientType deployJobCluster(ClusterSpecification clusterSpecification, JobGraph jobGraph)
      Deploys a per-job cluster with the given job on the cluster.
      ClientType deploySessionCluster(ClusterSpecification clusterSpecification)
      Triggers deployment of a cluster.
      java.lang.String getClusterDescription()
      Returns a String containing details about the cluster (NodeManagers, available memory, ...).
      ClientType retrieve(java.lang.String applicationID)
      Retrieves an existing Flink Cluster.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getClusterDescription

        java.lang.String getClusterDescription()
        Returns a String containing details about the cluster (NodeManagers, available memory, ...).

      • retrieve

        ClientType retrieve(java.lang.String applicationID)
             throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Retrieves an existing Flink Cluster.
        参数:
        applicationID - The unique application identifier of the running cluster
        返回:
        Client for the cluster
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if this cluster descriptor doesn't support the operation

      • deploySessionCluster

        ClientType deploySessionCluster(ClusterSpecification clusterSpecification)
                         throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Triggers deployment of a cluster.
        参数:
        clusterSpecification - Cluster specification defining the cluster to deploy
        返回:
        Client for the cluster
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if this cluster descriptor doesn't support the operation

      • deployJobCluster

        ClientType deployJobCluster(ClusterSpecification clusterSpecification,
                            JobGraph jobGraph)
        Deploys a per-job cluster with the given job on the cluster.
        参数:
        clusterSpecification - Initial cluster specification with which the Flink cluster is launched
        jobGraph - JobGraph with which the job cluster is started
        返回:
        Cluster client to talk to the Flink cluster
        抛出:
        ClusterDeploymentException - if the cluster could not be deployed
